you_have_logged_out: You have logged out of your account.

playlist.select_playlist: First, select a playlist. You can create a playlist by right clicking the left side
playlist.already_exist: You received a playlist from {{senderName}} but you already have that playlist. So we don't add it to your playlists. Playlist Name: {{playlistName}}
playlist.received: You received a playlist from {{senderName}}. Playlist Name: {{playlistName}}

delete_all.title: Are you sure you want to delete all songs?

playlist.add_some_songs: Add some songs to get started

search_track.content: You can add a song to the playlist by entering a track name or you can pass here by a spotify, youtube
search_track.title: Add a song to the playlist
search_track.subtitle: Search and discover new music
search_track.placeholder: Track name or url (supports playlist and album)

general.ui_disabled: At the moment you can't open the radio cause its using by another player.
general.edit_enabled: Edit mode is enabled. Now you can sort the playlist and songs by dragging
general.delete.confirm: Please click again delete to confirm.
general.account_sharing_disabled: You can't access the audioplayer, because the server disabled the account sharing.

shared.title: Nearby Players
shared.no_players: No one was found to share the playlist

open.menu: Press [E] to open the DJ menu

minimal_hud.title: Minimal HUD
minimal_hud.description: When you activate it. You can manage the songs in your playlist with the shortcuts even when you close the menu. To learn the shortcuts, move your mouse to the play, forward and back buttons.

position.title: Minimal Hud Position
position.top_left_description: The minimal hud will be placed on the top left corner of your screen
position.top_right_description: The minimal hud will be placed on the top right corner of your screen
position.bottom_left_description: The minimal hud will be placed on the bottom left corner of your screen
position.bottom_right_description: The minimal hud will be placed on the bottom right corner of your screen

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in
login.this_user_credentials_has_been_modified: This user credentials has been modified. Please log in again.
login.select_account_subtitle: Choose from your saved accounts or sign in manually
